participant_1.name: Alice Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Alice loves meeting new people and engaging in lively conversations.
participant_1.background: Alice grew up in a small town but moved to the city for university. She works in marketing and enjoys socializing during her free time.

participant_2.name: Mark Thompson
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, Mark has a knack for making others laugh and lightening the mood.
participant_2.background: Mark is a software engineer who hails from the suburbs. In his spare time, he enjoys playing video games and hiking.
